title: 03/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why the Seahawks might consider trading star QB Russell Wilson and what it would take for one NFL team to make it happen. He defends the Patriots for re-signing QB Cam Newton and why we should expect New England to be much better in 2021. Colin lays out the difficulties the Chiefs are now facing in order to continue their dominant run with Patrick Mahomes under center. Plus, he takes a look at two legendary coaches in sports and where they went wrong after a long run of success.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
